name: Full Reddit Post Length
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
Always see the full Reddit post without clicking on them no matter how long they are. If you want to set your own max-height I recommend to use the "vh" unit (50vh is 50% of your View Port (your browser size)). But every other commmon css unit like "px" or "rem" works too. If you set a max-height, you still dont have to go to the post instead you can scoll on the individual post.
